procedure.title: 2023 Sacred Heart Senior NS, Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services for additional accommodation for Sacred Heart Senior National School, 13 Whitestone Drive, Tallaght Business Park, Dublin
procedure.description:
**Title:** 2023 Sacred Heart Senior NS, Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services for Additional Accommodation

**Description:**
Sacred Heart Senior National School, located at 13 Whitestone Drive, Tallaght Business Park, Dublin, is under the patronage of the Archdiocese of Dublin, led by Archbishop Dermot Farrell. The project aims to enhance the school's facilities by providing additional accommodation to support the educational needs of its students. The scope of the project includes:

1. **Classroom and SEN Base:**
   - Two classrooms with a Special Educational Needs (SEN) base, including washrooms, with a total floor area including circulation and internal walls of 473 square meters.

2. **Secure and Soft Play Area:**
   - A secure play area of 100 square meters to ensure student safety.
   - A soft play area of 100 square meters for recreational activities.

3. **Sensory Garden:**
   - A sensory garden of 100 square meters designed to promote sensory learning and well-being.

4. **Parking Spaces:**
   - Six parking spaces to accommodate staff and visitors.

5. **Interim Temporary Accommodation:**
   - Provision of interim temporary accommodation (100 square meters) including all required statutory approvals and compliances. This temporary structure will be used by the school until the permanent additional accommodation is completed. The Design Team (DT) must ensure that the location of the interim temporary accommodation does not impede the development of the permanent structure. All interim temporary accommodation will be removed from the school site upon completion of the permanent structure. Associated substructures, underground services, etc., shall be removed, and the site shall be reinstated.

**Key Requirements:**
- The bidder must have experience in mechanical and electrical engineering services for educational institutions.
- The bidder should demonstrate expertise in designing and implementing temporary and permanent structures that meet educational and safety standards.
- The bidder must ensure compliance with all relevant statutory approvals and regulations.
- The bidder should provide a detailed project schedule and timeline for completion.
- The bidder must guarantee the removal of all temporary structures and reinstatement of the site upon completion of the permanent structure.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
- Technical competence and experience in similar projects.
- Ability to meet project timelines and deadlines.
- Compliance with statutory regulations and approvals.
- Quality of design and construction materials.
- Cost-effectiveness and value for money.
- Ability to provide interim temporary accommodation without disrupting ongoing school activities.

By responding to this public tender, bidders will contribute to enhancing the educational environment at Sacred Heart Senior National School, ensuring a safe, inclusive, and supportive learning space for all students.
